note: The score in recent years is very high even though many countries are far from equal participation because the index scores them relative to the historical average across countries.
title: Women's political participation index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem), weighted by countries' populations. It captures the extent to which women are represented in the legislature and have an equal share of political power. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most equal).
